titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an exemption from the overtime provisions for professional employees of contractors or subcontractors of the Resolution Trust Corporation who are paid on a hourly basis.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committee.name: House Education and Labor
committee.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

bill.summary: 9/30/1994--Introduced. Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt from overtime provisions professional employees of contractors or subcontractors of the Resolution Trust Corporation who are paid on an hourly basis.
